Detailed Description

A Cartesian coordinate that is defined by an x and y component.

This class includes operators for addition, subtraction, comparison, and streaming, as well as a handful of methods for transforming and rotating coordinates.

double RmUtility::Coord::angleFrom (  const Coord &  coord  )  const [inline]
 

Returns the clockwise polar angle from the given coordinate to this coordinate.

The angles of both coordinates are calculated from (0,0).
